title: Approval for importation/procurement of rice
decision_details: - Due to the rice shortage in the local market, measures are being taken to procure 70,000 metric tons of rice by M/s Sri Lanka State Trading (General) Corporation, as per the approval granted at the Cabinet meeting held on 2024 12 09.  Similarly, private sector importers have also been permitted to import rice up to 2024 12 20 without Import Control License. It has been observed that the shortage of rice in the local market may continue up to the end of January 2025. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Trade, Commerce, Food Security and Cooperative Development to extend the period granted to the private sector importers to import rice without Import Control Licenses, up to 2025 01 10, was approved by the Cabinet.
